wikipedia_page.main: Arthur William à Beckett (25 October 1844 – 14 January 1909) was an English journalist and intellectual.

response: His brother was Arthur William à Beckett.
**Arthur William à Beckett joins the staff of Punch.
He was the father of two other Victorian writers, Gilbert Arthur à Beckett and Arthur William à Beckett.
